Columns.Name: グループ既定値優先フラグ
既存建物旧計算方法フラグ
解析時見積添付フラグ
工事判定自動見積フラグ
保証書原本郵送フラグ
付保証明書必要フラグ

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql:
SELECT 
    main.group_id AS 'グループID',
    main.customer_id AS '顧客ID',
    sub.group_default_priority_flg AS 'グループ既定値優先フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.specify_surveying_customer_id
        ELSE suba.specify_surveying_customer_id
    END AS '指定測量会社ID',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.existing_object_oldcalculate_flg
        ELSE suba.existing_object_oldcalculate_flg
    END AS '既存建物旧計算方法フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.delivery_file_format
        ELSE suba.delivery_file_format
    END AS '納品ファイル形式',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.no_construction_estimate_flg
        ELSE suba.no_construction_estimate_flg
    END AS '解析時見積添付フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.study_paper_request_flg
        ELSE suba.study_paper_request_flg
    END AS '検討書必要フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.auto_construction_estimate_flg
        ELSE suba.auto_construction_estimate_flg
    END AS '工事判定自動見積フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.specify_compaction_customer_id
        ELSE suba.specify_compaction_customer_id
    END AS '指定転圧会社ID',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.no_compaction_judge_flg
        ELSE suba.no_compaction_judge_flg
    END AS '転圧判定不可フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.no_compaction_estimate_flg
        ELSE suba.no_compaction_estimate_flg
    END AS '転圧見積不要フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.comaction_other_construction_flg
        ELSE suba.comaction_other_construction_flg
    END AS '転圧他社施工フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.compaction_re_survey_flg
        ELSE suba.compaction_re_survey_flg
    END AS '転圧再調査フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.surplus_soil_disposal_flg
        ELSE suba.surplus_soil_disposal_flg
    END AS '残土処分フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.no_construction_estimate_flg
        ELSE suba.no_construction_estimate_flg
    END AS '工事見積不要フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.construction_cotract_flg
        ELSE suba.construction_cotract_flg
    END AS '工事請負フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.warranty_period
        ELSE suba.warranty_period
    END AS '既定保証期間',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.warranty_mailing_flg
        ELSE suba.warranty_mailing_flg
    END AS '保証書原本郵送フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.mailing_commission_flg
        ELSE suba.mailing_commission_flg
    END AS '郵送手数料フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.mailing_method_id
        ELSE suba.mailing_method_id
    END AS '郵送方法ID',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.insurance_certificate_need_flg
        ELSE suba.insurance_certificate_need_flg
    END AS '付保証明書必要フラグ',

    CASE 
        WHEN sub.group_default_priority_flg = 1 THEN subb.warranty_additional_notes
        ELSE suba.warranty_additional_notes
    END AS '保証追記事項'

FROM 
    m_customer_group AS main
INNER JOIN 
    m_group AS sub
    ON main.group_id = sub.group_id
INNER JOIN 
    m_customer_default AS suba
    ON main.customer_id = suba.customer_id
LEFT JOIN 
    m_customer_default AS subb
    ON sub.customer_id = subb.customer_id
